metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4216 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
A Floating point exception (division-by-zero) flaw was found in Mupdf for zero width pages in muraster.c. It is fixed in Mupdf-1.20.0-rc1 upstream.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.20.3+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.20.3+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.20.3+ds1-1').
